title: Me depressed?: don't make me laugh
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Suicide
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Depression, Mental
description: Beneath Spike Milligan's comedic career lay a severe and debilitating depression, and he is the perfect candidate to present this helpful video on depression and ways of treating it. He speaks with sufferers as well as experts, providing a useful tool for sufferers, family and friends, and health professionals. Included on this tape are; types of depression, the importance of daily activity, charting the rise and fall of moods, controlling negative thoughts, the role of medication, the role of family and friends, suicide, and where to go for help.
